meanings.definition: The reason for which something is done or created.
meanings.sent1: Her purpose in baking cookies was to share them with her friends.
meanings.sent2: The purpose of the flashlight is to provide light in the dark.
meanings.sent3: His purpose in wearing a cape to school was to make his classmates laugh.
meanings.sent4: The purpose of a lighthouse is to guide ships safely to shore.
meanings.sent5: The purpose of a key is to unlock doors.

meanings.sent1: His purpose in studying hard is to get good grades.
meanings.sent2: The purpose of her visit was to congratulate her friend on the promotion.
meanings.sent3: Their purpose in wearing matching outfits was to confuse their classmates.
meanings.sent4: The purpose of a detective is to solve mysteries and catch criminals.
meanings.sent5: The purpose of a map is to help travelers find their way.
